name: Rush Hour (itch) (KubaJaky)
description:
A short game about working in a Hotel, one player uses keyboard (A and D for moving, E for using) and the second player uses the mouse (left click, right click) to operate everything on the desk.

Music:

Gameplay Music - Way out West by Twin Musicom

Menu Music - Old Bossa by Twin Musicom

SFX  - soundly

Font - Thirteen Pixel
